name: masurca
publications: Zimin, A. et al. The MaSuRCA genome Assembler. Bioinformatics (2013).
Marçais, G. & Kingsford, C. A fast, lock-free approach for efficient parallel counting of occurrences of k-mers. Bioinformatics (Oxford, England) 27, 764-70 (2011).
description: Whole genome assembly software. MaSuRCA can assemble data sets containing only short reads from Illumina sequencing or a mixture of short reads and long reads (Sanger, 454).
